event_text: m_c was grabbed by a seagull, but luckily r_c saves them! The kit is still left injured from the ordeal.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred as a kit, when a seagull tried to carry them off.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after a seagull tried to carry them off.

event_text: m_c was grabbed by an osprey, but luckily r_c saves them! The kit is still left injured from the ordeal.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred as a kit, when an osprey tried to carry them off.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after an osprey tried to carry them off.

event_text: r_c dares m_c to try and swim out of camp and m_c can't possibly refuse the challenge. They don't make it far, however, before their meager swimming skills fail them and they nearly drown before an adult spots them and comes to the rescue.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died of water-inhalation, after trying to swim out of camp.

event_text: r_c dares m_c to try and swim out of camp. m_c can't possibly refuse the challenge, but the water is freezing when they jump in. Though an adult quickly notices and scoops them out, m_c is still shivering violently from the cold.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died after swimming through freezing water when dared by r_c.

event_text: m_c is hopping around in the tide pools when they trip and fall onto the rocks. Thankfully they're only a bit bruised.
m_c is playing around on the iced-over tide pools, slipping and sliding every which way, when they slip a little too much and take a tumble.
m_c is jumping around on the rocks when they slip and fall. The soft sand of the cave floor softens their landing, but they're still sporting some new bruises.
m_c is playing around on the iced-over tide pools, slipping and sliding every which way, when they slip a little too much and take a tumble.
m_c is playing around on the iced-over tide pools, slipping and sliding every which way, when they slip a little too much and twist their paw.
m_c found a hole in the rocks and, curious as all kits are, stuck their paw inside. The whole camp comes running when they screech in pain. It seems a snake was living in that hole.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred as a kit, when a snake bit them.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after a snake bit them.
